casebody.data:
John Sproha et al. v. Clinton Planning Commission et al.

House, C. J., Cotter, Thim, Shapiro and Loiselle, Js.

Argued October 13 decided November 2, 1971 David B. Greenberg, for the appellant. John T. Gummishey, Jr., for the appellees. *578Pee Cueiam.

We find no merit to this appeal from a decision of the Clinton planning commission. The decision of the trial court is affirmed for the reasons stated in its memorandum of decision.

There is no error.
